group_1.textCenter: It's their Valentine's Day exclusive menu item.@The chocolate-cheese tart!
I was eyeing the empty display, when the clerk@called out to me.
And they actually let me take the leftovers…!
Cheese and chocolate taste best when they@don't fully mix.
The sweetness of the chocolate and the@richness of the cheese...
Every time I take a bite, they melt in different@ways!
(Plus… there's a way to enjoy this that only@I can do…)
(In this form, the cheese tastes even more@delicious…)
(And in this form, the chocolate tastes even@sweeter!)
…Two flavors of yum in a single dish!
It's almost like this menu was made for me!

group_1.narration: My apron actually holds a secret.
When I change into Chocolatier Mode,@it's not only my sense of taste that changes.
When I wear this outfit,@I can summon the memories of@the Nagisa from that other universe…@Who knew everything about chocolate!

group_1.textCenter: I'm super glad that in both universes...
Mitakihara City holds the same Valentine's Day@promotional events.
Anyways, the chocolate coins I was after were@sold out here as well.
But in exchange I got to enjoy some delicious@tart.
…I'm in a good mood now, so let's get back to@chocolate hunting.
So that being said, it's time to head ou—

group_1.textRight: I was just about to head out.
The chocolate-cheese tart here was really good.

group_1.textLeft: Don't tell me Kyoko also came here to eat it…
